Articles.Content:
Hey, folks!

Well, first I'd like to introduce myself. My name is Mad Potatoes, and I don't know why do I have this potato on my top hat. Once I tried to take it off and almost died, so I think it became a vital organ...

Asides the biology, some of you might know me from the Don't Starve forums, though this has a pretty small chance of happening, because i've been inactive for roughly 4-5 months.

Anyway, let's get to business!

This one has a slight Portal 2 reference

And, yes, I like to steal the blackboard from the school. My classmates like my work, and even the teachers seem to be slightly amazed

Wow.. *-*

I like that Art.! Respect, shading is very difficult with chalk..

I would like to see more of you.. ;D

Yours sincerely, Tobias
That's amazingly funny! You've got talent!

Wow.. *-*

I like that Art.! Respect, shading is very difficult with chalk..

I would like to see more of you.. ;D

Yours sincerely, Tobias

Thanks, luv

That's amazingly funny! You've got talent!

Thanks! It's pretty bad that i have only a few chalk colours disponible

But you'll have my digital art very soon, i just need to refresh my brain >.<

These are good!

Really good infact. You should take requests from people, I'd be interested to see my SSTO made with chalk.

I'm exited to see your digital art.

These are good!

Really good infact. You should take requests from people, I'd be interested to see my SSTO made with chalk.

I'm exited to see your digital art.

Well, requests are pretty difficult for me to do because it doesn't come to my head instantly, so people have to wait and wait... Also, i fear that it wouldn't be exactly what the requester imagined

But if you want to leave a request, it's okay. I'll try to give all the necassary effort (btw, can you give me a link to a screenshot your SSTO, please?)

Also, how do you guys get an avatar? I already tried it a lot of times, but there's no way at the moment

.there will be a lot of Jeb in the next work that will pop up in this thread soon..

Also, how do you guys get an avatar? I already tried it a lot of times, but there's no way at the moment

Seems you found out.

But here's a pic. If you need a better angle ask.

Seems you found out.

But here's a pic. If you need a better angle ask.

Yeah xD

Well, you could take some front screenshots... Unless you want it in the picture's position ^^
I can tomorrow... can't access a computer now... sorry. :3

After u have done the above 1 could u do mine?

Javascript is disabled. View full album
HA! Honey.. you are in demand.. :DD

@RocketTurtle and @Fitzy3

I assure you that your spacecrafts will be done in Monday (now i wont forget to save the photos in my phone ^^)

And i've been too lazy to draw something, but as i'm on vacation now, i finally got time to do stuff

First, a meme.

For those who didnt understand, that's Jeb

Edited December 6, 2013 by Mad Potatoes
Ha! Sorry for not posting more pictures... I should get to that.

Ha! Sorry for not posting more pictures... I should get to that.

Well, you can post them is you want...

I was thinking about to draw it in that angle ^^

Okay guys, you wanted to see my digital artwork...

U GET MY DIGITAL ARTWORK!!!!

Seriously, i was up until 1:30 AM to make this. Was worth it.
I like that alot! When I try to make pictures in GIMP, it comes out to be something a 3 year old could do in MS Paint.

I like that alot! When I try to make pictures in GIMP, it comes out to be something a 3 year old could do in MS Paint.

Oh, I use SAI Paint Tool. It's the best for tablet users because it recognizes pressure and has a pretty simple interface. It's good for mouse users too, but if you already know everything about how to use GIMP and are a mouse user, you should keep it.

I should get a tablet... because, frankly, I'm quite good at hand drawing. I make sketches at school alot.

Here is one of my bad ones...

TERRIBLE DRAWING MADE IN LIKE 10 MINUTES IMMINENT!

@Mad: Post it on the first page in your thread intruduction..

@Turtle: Well, the lines arent very straight, but you have a great sense of perspective.. really good.!

@Mad: Post it on the first page in your thread intruduction..

You know me, i make a lot of arts, if i put them all in the intro page, it will get COLOSSAL and slow to load with laggy connections. And when i make the users go through all my thread to hunt for art, they can accidentally have some pretty good laughters ^^

@Turtle: Well, the lines arent very straight, but you have a great sense of perspective.. really good.!

He's right, Turtle!

Protip: To make the lines less irregular, you can draw them a little bit faster and with less strength (you will use the eraser somewhat more frequently, though).
Remember I mentioned I drew it in 10 minutes when I should have been paying attention in math...

Remember I mentioned I drew it in 10 minutes when I should have been paying attention in math...

Ah, so give me a drawing of yours, drawn with full power!

Well, I sorta spilled coffee on the majority of them a few weeks ago.. most were just WIP's though... I made a thread of that pic and I took a few requests but they were also victims of the coffee...

I'll make a new one tomorrow, so expect it done in a few days/weeks/months/years because I always procrastinate on that kind of stuff.

Well, we're two.

Procrastination FTW!

but hey... why should coffee be a problem? It's pretty charming ^^
It was devil coffee, intent with the life goal of ruining my art.
